question:
Consider the following statements about the Green Growth Equity Fund that was recently in news:
  1. India and UK have jointly announced to establish Green Growth Equity Fund
  2. The proposed fund will be established under the National Investment and Infrastructure Fund (NIIF) framework
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. India and UK have jointly announced the establishment of the Green Growth Equity Fund (GGEF). <u>Second statement is correct</u>. The proposed fund will be set up under the fund of funds vertical of NIIF, and will have anchor commitments of GBP 120 million each from Government of India (through NIIF) and Government of UK.
